short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace movie names in Notion with their IMDb links for quick bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever made a movie list in Notion and got tired of manually going to IMDb to get each movie's link? 
With MovieLink you can now do that in seconds, without leaving notion, just with a few keyboard shortcuts! Get your watched/to-watch lists in order quicker than ever!
